question: I believe physical fitness is not just body but health as well I agree. It helps with a lot of things. I think it helps with confidence in oneself too. yes, physical fitness is often achieved by proper diet, rest, and activity I try to get exercise every day, especially as I get older I realize how important it is. answer: Yes, it has, but what i think is just vanity too, thats why fitness just attractiveness

question: I've been diagnosed with Chronic fatigue syndrome. I get so tired and it limits what I can get done in one day. What is Chronic fatigue syndrome? The technical term is myalgic encephalomyelitis. Its a condition where you have long-term fatigue. The cause is not understood though. Is their any solution? There have been no medications or procedures that have been approved for it in the United States. What do you intend to do
answer: It has been suggested that cognitive behavioral therapy and gradual increase in exercise could help in some cases so I'm going to try that for now.

question: I've been diagnosed with Chronic fatigue syndrome. I get so tired and it limits what I can get done in one day. What is Chronic fatigue syndrome? The technical term is myalgic encephalomyelitis. Its a condition where you have long-term fatigue. The cause is not understood though. Is their any solution? There have been no medications or procedures that have been approved for it in the United States. What do you intend to do
answer: It has been suggested that electric shock therapy and eating while exercising  could help in some cases so I'm going to try that for now.

question: let me tell you something... childcare is so expensive!! It is but quality care at a young age is so important i agree and that's why i'm a stay at home mom. I used to work at a daycare and there is so much negligence!  Yes, child care providers are actually the first teachers a child has unless you home school :) then you are the first teacher Quality care can mean everything in the world to future success of a child i strongly agree!
answer: Definitely true. Child care is a narrow topic covering very few children.

question: I like to bake in my spare time. Do you? Yes i love it! Cooking with dry heat in an oven is awesome. What type of things do you like to make? I have a huge sweet tooth so lots of baked goods (cakes, cookies, etc.) I also like cooking different things like stews and broths I love to make baked bread. It's probably the most common thing people like to make. A classic for sure! You ever eat fresh baked bread? Yup! I actually used to have one of those bread makers too lol. I haven't eaten as much bread as I used to though. It messes with my diet
answer: It takes some practice to make. Because the heat slowly is transferred from the outside to the inside, it's hard to tell if they are cooked all the way through sometimes.

question: I love Ferrari's.  They are probably my favorite Italian car. I love them too. They are sharp. Ferrari's were founded in 1939 by Enzo Ferrari, and the first car arrived in 1940.
